payload.content: Claude transformed coding in 2025, and in 2026, it will transform knowledge work.

name: Claude transformed coding in 2025, and in 2026, it will transform knowledge work
content: Claude transformed coding in 2025, and in 2026, it will transform knowledge work.

payload.content: The launch of Claude Opus 4.6 marks a watershed moment for AI becoming a real working partner for people in industries like finance and consulting who use spreadsheets, slide decks, and long documents.

name: The launch of Claude Opus 4.6 marks a watershed moment for AI becoming a real wo
content: The launch of Claude Opus 4.6 marks a watershed moment for AI becoming a real working partner for people in industries like finance and consulting who use spreadsheets, slide decks, and long documents.

payload.content: The transformation of knowledge work by AI in 2026 will parallel the transformation of coding by AI in 2025, where 'vibe coding' (coined by @karpathy) allowed anyone to build software by describing their needs.

name: The transformation of knowledge work by AI in 2026 will parallel the transformat
content: The transformation of knowledge work by AI in 2026 will parallel the transformation of coding by AI in 2025, where 'vibe coding' (coined by @karpathy) allowed anyone to build software by describing their needs.

payload.content: On internal benchmarks for real-world finance tasks, Opus 4.6 improved by over 23% compared to Sonnet 4.5, which was considered state-of-the-art recently.

name: On internal benchmarks for real-world finance tasks, Opus 4.6 improved by over 2
content: On internal benchmarks for real-world finance tasks, Opus 4.6 improved by over 23% compared to Sonnet 4.5, which was considered state-of-the-art recently.

payload.content: The performance improvements of Opus 4.6 are demonstrated in tasks like building financial models, creating pitch decks, and M&A analysis, which typically take an analyst weeks.

name: The performance improvements of Opus 4.6 are demonstrated in tasks like building
content: The performance improvements of Opus 4.6 are demonstrated in tasks like building financial models, creating pitch decks, and M&A analysis, which typically take an analyst weeks.

payload.content: Opus 4.6 produces first-pass deliverables that are significantly better, often landing where previous models required multiple rounds of revision or couldn't achieve at all.

name: Opus 4.6 produces first-pass deliverables that are significantly better, often l
content: Opus 4.6 produces first-pass deliverables that are significantly better, often landing where previous models required multiple rounds of revision or couldn't achieve at all.

payload.content: To fully leverage AI model improvements, product integration is crucial, as seen with Claude Code which provided a user interface for applying coding advancements.

name: To fully leverage AI model improvements, product integration is crucial, as seen
content: To fully leverage AI model improvements, product integration is crucial, as seen with Claude Code which provided a user interface for applying coding advancements.

payload.content: New product integrations like Cowork (allowing multiple analyses on a folder of files), Claude in Excel (handling multi-tab financial models), and Claude in PowerPoint (building and iterating presentations natively) are being shipped to apply Claude's capabilities where people work.

name: New product integrations like Cowork (allowing multiple analyses on a folder of
content: New product integrations like Cowork (allowing multiple analyses on a folder of files), Claude in Excel (handling multi-tab financial models), and Claude in PowerPoint (building and iterating presentations natively) are being shipped to apply Claude's capabilities where people work.
